description: Manages the end-to-end customer registration, verification, and setup process.
Handles the presentation and management of offers to customers.
Performs money transfers between internal and external accounts.
Manages creation, update, and execution of loan agreements.
Evaluates credit risk profiles for lending decisions.
Handles setup, maintenance, and maturity of term deposits.
Manages know-your-customer identity verification and compliance checks.
Tracks customer interactions, preferences, and history.
